channel.title: FastAPI on DevSetGo
channel.description: Recent content in FastAPI on DevSetGo

item.title: Python FastAPI Library
item.description: Over the last few months I have been learning Python's Asyncio library. It came from a need at work. I needed to pull a large about of data from Sonarqube. The data is broke into pages of 500 issues each and it required about 50 calls to retrieve all the issues. Using Requests this took about 8-10 minutes via synchronous calls. Each page load being 4-8 seconds and the data processing at the end (about 10 seconds).
